comments.author: nzgirl02
comments.body:
Traveling overseas for any surgery is a scary experience, even more so when the surgery is unavailable in ones own country.  

After less than positive initial interactions with several Thai clinics I contacted IM Gender clinic in Spain and the response was efficient and professional, and before I agreed to anything I had a video consult with the surgeon who would actually perform the work, talked about my fears and needs, and agreed on the proceedure required. 

The clinic experience itself was very good, all the staff caring and professional, and after care - both in Spain and by video/email since my return - undertaken by the surgeon herself, with all fears and questions attended to.  Now at 10 weeks, I am happy with the results, and slowly returning to my normally very physical life.

With the cost being comparable to the more popular Thai surgeons, IM Gender is well worth considering.

JamieMarie
